Returns: the builder object itself for method chaining
Parameters: the notification behavior. It's a bit-wise of @B_com#google#android#gms#location#GeofencingRequest#INITIAL_TRIGGER_ENTER_E@ and/or @B_com#google#android#gms#location#GeofencingRequest#INITIAL_TRIGGER_EXIT_E@ and/or @B_com#google#android#gms#location#GeofencingRequest#INITIAL_TRIGGER_DWELL_E@.
setInitialTrigger(int).Description: Sets the geofence notification behavior at the moment when the geofences are added. The default behavior is @B_com#google#android#gms#location#GeofencingRequest#INITIAL_TRIGGER_ENTER_E@ and @B_com#google#android#gms#location#GeofencingRequest#INITIAL_TRIGGER_DWELL_E@.

Returns: the builder object itself for method chaining

Throws: if the geofence is not built with @B_com#google#android#gms#location#Geofence#Builder_E@.
